mapper.select: select ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM backend_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN backend_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN backend_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN backend_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
